dmca.title: U.K. individual complains of defamatory and harrasing websites
dmca.body:
As promised, I am writing to you by way of a follow-up to our conversation yesterday giving you details of offending material.

[redacted]

That aside, the most important action that is required is for the postings to be removed and for steps to be taken by Google to ensure that there is no repetition given the obvious ability of [private] to simply switch URLs.
